rukus.text: I yesli My posylali v kakoye-libo seleniye proroka, to nepremenno nasylali na yego zhiteley bedu i nuzhdu, chtoby stali oni smirennymi

Zatem My zamenyali [im] nevzgody na blagopoluchiye, chtoby nastupilo dlya nikh oblegcheniye, i oni vosklitsali: "Nashim predkam takzhe dostavalis' i radosti, i goresti". No My podvergali ikh nakazaniyu vnezapno, tak chto oni i [ne uspevali] osoznat'
Yesli by zhiteli etikh poseleniy uverovali i byli bogoboyaznennymi, My otkryli by pered nimi [vrata] blagodeyaniy s neba i zemli. No oni ne uverovali, i My nakazali ikh za to, chto oni sovershali
Neuzheli zhiteli seleniy polagali, chto Nasha kara ne nastignet ikh noch'yu, kogda oni spyat
Neuzheli zhiteli seleniy polagali, chto Nashe nakazaniye ne nastignet ikh zasvetlo, kogda oni predayutsya potekham
Neuzheli oni ne osteregalis' zamyslov Allakha? Tol'ko lyudi zabludshiye ne osteregayutsya zamyslov Allakha
